Text:

Countdown to their black communist messiah making "change they can believe in"(see above).

These people need to be blinded in sight until they see with their minds...WHAT minds though..brainwashed ignorant one sided socialists that know what's best for you YOU don't know what's best for YOU. THEY do. 

To HELL with MSNBC. They are enemies of the state. Enemies of the Republic and it's people. 
The sooner people start to realize this the sooner we can get rid of the slime that has taken over our government. Millions do now and the numbers will continue to grow. REAL Americans are no longer going to put up with their lies and BULLSHIT.

So why post this educated FOOL? Anonymous? Right...twat. It's probably someone FROM MSNBC and it would not even surprise me if it was. Those fuckers are the TRUE mod the TRUE extremists. 

You will NOT take my freedoms or my family's freedoms.
